name: Mobius 3i
headline: Compact fully-covered invisible loudspeaker
description: Most compact Mobius model for tight stud or joist spacing and cost-sensitive invisible audio, delivering clear natural performance with consistent Mobius voicing.
story: The Mobius 3i is the most compact model in Amina’s Mobius range, designed for installations where stud or joist spacing is limited, or where a discreet and cost-effective solution is required. Despite its smaller size, it employs the same core technologies as the flagship Mobius 7i — including proprietary transducers with Optidrive®, Opti-damping® and Reduced Resonance Exciter® innovations — to deliver clear, natural performance that extends well into the ultrasonic region. Perfect for use in secondary spaces such as guest rooms, corridors, or ancillary areas, the Mobius 3i ensures a consistent listening experience across larger projects while maintaining the seamless integration of invisible audio.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
applications: Invisible audio installations with space limitations
Distributed audio and medium-level listening within residential properties such as MDUs
Medium-level full-bandwidth music listening when paired with a subwoofer
specs: Electrical connection Blue butt-splice crimp terminals (14–16 AWG)
Fixing requirements Backbox CV300/SW300 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: A clean corner perspective that highlights the panel’s slim build and straightforward integration behind a 2mm skim—designed to disappear once finished.
A refined side view showing the low-profile depth and edge geometry—ideal for tight stud spacing while keeping the finished surface perfectly uninterrupted.

name: Mobius 5i
headline: High performance fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Versatile Mobius panel delivering signature clarity and openness for residential and commercial invisible audio systems.
story: The Mobius 5i delivers the signature clarity and openness of Amina’s Mobius range in a versatile format suited to a wide variety of applications. Drawing on over two decades of research and development, it incorporates proprietary transducers together with Optidrive®, Opti-damping® and Reduced Resonance Exciter® technologies to achieve smooth, detailed performance well into the ultrasonic region.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
specs: Electrical connection Blue butt-splice crimp terminals (14–16 AWG)
Fixing requirements Backbox CV345/SW345 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: Balanced proportions and a composed footprint—built for seamless plaster finishing while delivering the scale and openness the Mobius range is known for.

name: Mobius 5i / S200
headline: Slimline fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Slimline Mobius panel engineered for restricted spaces and gently curved walls or ceilings.
story: The Mobius 5i/S200 is the slimline counterpart to the Mobius 5i, engineered for installations where space is restricted or where curved surfaces demand a more flexible solution. At just 200mm wide, it integrates seamlessly into shallow stud walls and tight joist layouts.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
specs: Fixing requirements Backbox CV200/SW200 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: A corner angle that underlines the slim 200mm format—purpose-built for constrained cavities and clean detailing where every millimetre matters.
A crisp side profile that shows the narrow silhouette—suited to shallow walls and gentle curves, while remaining fully concealed once finished.

name: Mobius 7i
headline: Flagship fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Highest performance Mobius invisible loudspeaker with extended low-frequency reach and high output.
story: The Mobius 7i represents the pinnacle of Amina’s Mobius range, combining proprietary transducers with Optidrive®, Opti-damping® and Reduced Resonance Exciter® technologies to deliver exceptional clarity, openness, and dynamic range from a fully concealed form factor.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
specs: Fixing requirements Backbox CV345/SW345 or Mounting Blocks / Tab Mounting Kit

lifestyle.caption: A composed corner view that reflects the flagship panel’s scale—engineered for high output while remaining visually silent behind the finish.
A side profile that reveals the panel’s refined build—designed for confident performance and a seamless plaster finish with no visual compromise.
A rear corner detail highlighting the structural design—built to reduce resonance and support a more linear, controlled presentation once installed.

name: MobiusDuali
headline: Dual-channel fully-covered loudspeaker
description: Single-panel stereo invisible loudspeaker for spaces where a stereo pair cannot be accommodated.
story: MobiusDuali delivers high-quality dual-channel audio reproduction from a single invisible panel, using OptiDrive®, OptiDamping® and Reduced Resonance Exciter® technologies. Ideal where stereo width is less critical but sound quality and even dispersion remain essential.
finish: Fully-covered (2mm plaster skim or alternative finishes)
applications: Rooms with insufficient space for a stereo pair
specs: Fixing requirements Backbox CV/SW345 or Mounting Blocks
In-line protection unit 2 × APUi30C / APU-RS8iC / APU-RS16iC
